document.full_text: officials said confirmed deaths had climbed to 5,692, and foreign governments stepped up efforts to move their citizens out of harm's way or out of japan entirely.
document.title: nearly half a million japanese in shelters, as tolls rise and foreigners flee
lines_and_colors: officials said confirmed deaths had climbed to 5,692, and foreign governments stepped up efforts to move their citizens out of harm's way or out of japan entirely.
